Property.Name: Enabled
Property.Description: Controls if the Data Auditor Feature is Enabled

Property.Name: SendToExternalSystem
Property.Description: Controls if the Data Audit records can be sent to an External System

Property.Name: DaysToKeepIfPrimary
Property.Description: If Audit records are primarily stored in the Application database, This is the number of days before considering Audit records saved in the application database available for removal. Used when SendToExternalSystem is false

Property.Name: DaysToKeepIfSecondary
Property.Description: If Audit records are primarily stored outside the Application, This is the number of days before considering Audit records saved in the application database available for removal. Used when SendToExternalSystem is true

Property.Name: AdminAuditSearchResultLimit
Property.Description: The limit of search results returned
